property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: Play this card when another player plays an action that is moving your Dude out of the shootout. Your Dude remains in the shootout and gains a +2 Bullet bonus until the end of the shootout. Boot your Dude if he or she is unbooted.

property.name: Text
property.value: Public. Holy Ground. Miracles being performed by a Dude at this location have their Difficulty lowered by 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Target a Gadget attached to one of your Mad Scientists. Discard a Gadget from your hand and choose one action printed on the discarded Gadget. While the targeted Gadget is in play, it has that action printed on it and has its Difficulty increased by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mad Scientist. Weapon. Gadget Difficulty: 4. Shootout Pull: If the pull is black, this Dude has a -1 Bullet penalty (minimum 0) and is a Draw for this round of the shootout. If the pull is red, this Dude gains a +2 Bullet bonus and is a Stud for this round of the shootout.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: Play this card when you've won a round of a shootout. You can choose the first Dude that your opponent must Ace as a result of this round of the shootout.

property.name: Text
property.value: Alfred Barkum Sr. can move to The Courthouse. Noon: Pay an amount of Ghost Rock equal to the number of Dudes in this location (including Alfred Barkum Sr.). All other Dudes at this location have their Influence reduced by 1 until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mad Scientist:0. Weapon Gadgets created by Alice Chamberlain have their Ghost Rock cost reduced by 2. Reaction: After you Ace a Wanted Dude in a shootout with a posse including Alice, take an additional bounty of 1 Ghost Rock from the Wanted Dude's controller (if possible).

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Harrowed Power: Target one of your unbooted Harrowed Dudes. Until the end of the game, the Dude has the ability 'Shootout: Boot this Dude to move this Dude to the shootout's location and join your posse.' Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Harrowed Power: Target one of your unbooted Harrowed Dudes. Until the end of the game, all Spells targeting that Dude have +5 Difficulty. Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Blessed. Shootout Miracle 6: If this Miracle succeeds, target one of your Dudes in this shootout. That Dude cannot be Aced in this shootout unless you lose by at least two ranks.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Target a Deed in play. That Deed is Private until after Nightfall. If you are the owner and controller of the Deed, you gain 1 Ghost Rock for each Dude controlled by another player who is currently at that Deed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each player's highest-value Dude gains the following ability until after Nightfall: 'Shootout: Move this Dude to the location of the current shootout and join either posse, whether invited or not. This Dude cannot join a posse opposing other Dudes in your gang.'

property.name: Text
property.value: Shaman. Noon Spirit 8: Target a Goods at this location. If this Spirit succeeds, the Goods is Aced after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Target a Wanted Dude, who gains a +2 Bullet bonus until after Nightfall. Until after Nightfall, Dudes must pay the target's controller 3 Ghost Rock to refuse a call-out from the target, in addition to any other costs. Any player other than the target's controller who Aces the target before Nightfall gains 1 Victory Point.

property.name: Text
property.value: Huckster. Shootout Hex X: The Difficulty of this Hex is equal to the value of a target Goods in the opposing posse. If this Hex succeeds, the Goods is Aced.

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. Strike. All Dudes have their Bullet rating and Influence reduced by 1 (minimum 0) while at the Bat's Breath Mine.

property.name: Text
property.value: Blessed. Noon Miracle X: This Miracle's Difficulty is equal to three times the number of Blessed at this location. If this Miracle succeeds, all of the Blessed at this location become Studs until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Blessed. Shootout Miracle 5: If this Miracle succeeds, all Dudes in this posse gain a +1 Bullet bonus until the end of the shootout.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shaman. Noon Spirit X: The Difficulty of this Spirit is equal to the value of a target Terror in this or an adjacent location. If this Spirit succeeds, you gain control of the target until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Bladed Fist can attach Goods and be targeted as though he were a Sioux Dude. Shootout: Target a Goods with 'Knife' in the title in your hand or attached to Bladed Fist. Discard that Goods to give Bladed Fist a +1 Bullet bonus and make him a Stud. This action can be performed any number of times per turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Target and Ace one of your Dudes in this shootout. None of your other Dudes can be aced during this round of the shootout. Reactions to your Dude being aced cannot be played.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Target and boot a Sioux Dude in play. That Dude's Influence and Shaman rating are reduced to 0 until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Abomination. Non-Unique. The Bogie Man will not attach Goods. The Bogie Man's Influence is equal to the current Fear level, but his Influence is not added to your total during Nightfall. You cannot move any of your non-Terror Dudes into a location with the Bogie Man.

property.name: Text
property.value: Abomination. Non-Unique. The Bone Fiend will not attach Goods. There is no limit to the number of Bone Fiends each player can have in play. Card memory does not apply to Bone Fiends. The Ghost Rock cost of the Bone Fiend is reduced by 1 for each Huckster you have in play. The Bone Fiend cannot be Aced during a shootout unless your hand is beaten by at least two ranks.

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. Controller Noon: Pay 3 Ghost Rock and discard a card from your Play hand. Get any one Spell from your deck, show it to the other players, and put it in your Play hand. Shuffle the deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. Strike.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Texas Rangers

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Boot this Dude to boot another Dude at this location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Blessed. Noon Miracle Job 6: Boot this Blessed to start a job that targets a Deed. If the job succeeds and this Blessed is still in the posse, make the Spell pull. If the Miracle succeeds, the Deed and this Miracle are Aced and you gain 1 Victory Point.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Target one of your Dudes in your posse. The Dude gains a +1 Bullet bonus until the end of the shootout for every Dude by which your posse outnumbers the opposing posse.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mad Scientist. Gadget Difficulty: 4. Noon Pull: Ace the Choking Gas. All Dudes at this location with a value less than the pull must boot and go home.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Harrowed Power: Target one of your unbooted Harrowed Dudes. Until the end of the game, the target has a +2 Bullet bonus while he or she has no ready Weapons. Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Blessed. Noon Miracle X: You can choose any Difficulty for this Miracle. If this Miracle succeeds, all Dudes at this location (including this Blessed) with a value less than the Difficulty go home booted. Dudes with a value less than the Difficulty cannot move to this location until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced. Clell Miller gains a permanent +1 Bullet bonus every time a posse he is in Aces a Law Dogs or Blackjacks Dude.

property.name: Text
property.value: Blessed. Noon Miracle 8: If this Miracle succeeds, this Blessed cannot be targeted by other players' actions until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shaman. Noon Spirit 5: If this Spirit succeeds, any one Dude in this location has a -2 Bullet penalty (minimum 0) until after Nightfall. Shootout Spirit 7: If this Spirit succeeds, any one Dude in the opposing posse has a -2 Bullet penalty (minimum 0) until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Until after Nightfall next turn, a second (different) Cheatin'! card can be played on a player per Draw.

property.name: Text
property.value: The Blessed Dude (or Dudes) in play with the lowest skill rating is Aced. Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Abomination. Non-Unique. The Dark Beast will not attach Goods. When the Dark Beast is at a Strike, it gains a Bullet bonus equal to half the current Fear level rounded down.

property.name: Text
property.value: Huckster. Reaction Hex X: Boot this Huckster when Draw hands are compared in a shootout he or she is in. The Difficulty of this Hex is equal to the opponent's hand rank. If this Hex succeeds, none of your Dudes has to be Aced as a result of this round of the shootout.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Use when Darren and another Blackjacks Dude are in the Town Square. Target and boot the other Dude to give Darren a +1 Influence bonus until after Nightfall. You can do this any number of times per turn. Darren loses this Influence bonus while at home.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Sioux Union

property.name: Text
property.value: Other players' Shootout actions cannot target Deer Eater. Deer Eater will not trade away Goods. Noon: If Deer Eater is not equipped with a Sioux-only Goods card, attach one to him from your Play hand for 2 less Ghost Rock.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Law Dogs

property.name: Text
property.value: Call-outs from Deputy Dave Montreal cannot be refused unless he is Wanted.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Law Dogs

property.name: Text
property.value: Deputy Milo Powell is a Stud whenever you are the Winner.

property.name: Text
property.value: Blessed. Shootout Miracle 5: If this Miracle succeeds, this Blessed gains a +1 Bullet bonus until the end of the shootout if he or she does not have a ready Weapon. Shootout Miracle 8: If this Miracle succeeds, this Blessed gains a +3 Bullet bonus until the end of the shootout if he or she does not have a ready Weapon.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Agency

property.name: Text
property.value: Mad Scientist:2. Desmond Quentin will not trade a Gadget to a non-Agency Dude.

property.name: Text
property.value: Blessed. Noon Miracle 6: If this Miracle succeeds, Ace a Gadget in this location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon. Harrowed Power: Target an unbooted Harrowed Dude you control. Ace this card. Until the end of the game, the target has the ability 'Noon: Ace a Goods at this location.'

property.name: Text
property.value: Weapon. Shootout: Ace any one opposing Dude whose value is equal to or lower than this Dude's Bullet rating.

property.name: Text
property.value: Terrors cannot call out this Dude. Terrors in the same location as this Dude have a -1 Bullet penalty (minimum 0) and a -1 Influence penalty (minimum 0).

property.name: Text
property.value: Mad Scientist. Weapon. Gadget Difficulty: 6. While one or more Terrors are in the opposing posse during a shootout, this Dude is a Stud and gains a Bullet bonus equal to his or her Mad Scientist rating.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mad Scientist. Weapon. Gadget Difficulty: 5. Shootout: This Dude gains a +1 Bullet bonus until the end of the shootout. Shootout: This Dude gains a +1 Bullet bonus until the end of the shootout.

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. Strike.

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. Non-Unique. Improvement. Attach the Extra Room to a Deed you own when the Extra Room enters play. While the Extra Room is attached, that Deed has its final Production increased by 1 (if it has Production greater than 0). If the Deed is descarded or Aced, so is the Extra Room. There can be any number or Extra Rooms in play. Card memory does not apply to the Extra Room.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Target one of your Wanted Dudes and one of your non-Wanted Dudes. The Wanted Dude becomes un-Wanted, and the non-Wanted Dude becomes Wanted. Noon: Target one of you non-Wanted Dudes. That Dude becomes Wanted, and all current penalties to your Control Point total are reduced to 0.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shaman. Noon Spirit 5: If this Spirit succeeds, this Shaman can switch locations with any one of your Dudes in play. Movement restrictions apply. Noon Spirit 9: If this Spirit succeeds, this Shaman can switch locations with any one Dude in play. Movement restrictions apply.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Sioux Union

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Boot Ferret's Eye to move him to an adjacent location that contains a Huckster controlled by another player. Ferret's Eye calls out that Huckster.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon. Harrowed Power: Target an unbooted Harrowed Dude you control. Ace this card. Until the end of the game, the target has the ability 'Noon: Move this Dude to an out-of-town location.'

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: Play this card after a Mad Scientist boots to create a Gadget. Unboot the Mad Scientist. The Mad Scientist cannot create any more Gadgets this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: All Weapons on Dudes in this shootout become unready. Dudes cannot make Weapons ready during this shootout. Any Dude who is leaving this shootout, and all Dudes at the end of the shootout, can make one Weapon ready.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. This card has no Ghost Rock cost when being attached to Howard Findley. While this Dude and the Deed he or she is in are controlled by the same player, the Deed has its printed Production increased by 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Abomination. Experienced. Flim cannot attach Goods. Flim has no Upkeep cost when he is adjacent to Elijah. Shootout: Flim gains a +1 Bullet bonus until the end of the shootout. Flim can perform this action once per shootout round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. Controller Noon: Look at the top card of any deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Non-Unique. Public. Deeds adjacent to the Fountain are each worth 1 extra Control Point.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Maze Rats

property.name: Text
property.value: Freddy Fast-Hands will not attach Weapons. Shootout: Freddy Fast-Hands becomes a Stud for this round of the shootout. Shootout: Boot Freddy Fast-Hands to target a Weapon in the opposing posse. That Weapon becomes unready and cannot be made ready until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: If a Ghost Infestation is in play, that card and this card are Aced. Otherwise, attach this card to your home. While this card is in play, no player can win unless he or she also has more Control Points plus Victory Points than the current Fear level.

property.name: Text
property.value: All Terrors have their Ghost Rock and Upkeep costs reduced by 2 until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Non-Unique. Abomination. The 'Glom cannot attach Goods. Reaction: When another Dude in the same location as the eGlom is Aced and goes to Boot Hill, the 'Glom gains a permanent +1 Bullet bonus.

property.name: Text
property.value: Huckster. Noon Hex 6: If this Hex succeeds, this Huckster gains a +1 Influence bonus until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach the Guard Dog House to a Deed you own when the Guard Dog House enters play. While the Guard Dog House is attached, Dudes with a Bullet rating less than 2 cannot move to that Deed. If the Deed is discarded or Aced, so is the Guard Dog House.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Boot and move one of your unbooted Dudes at home to this location. He or she joins your posse.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Pull: The Dude in play whose value is closest to the pull (determine randomly if there is a tie) moves to the Town Square. That Dude can call out any Dude in play controlled by another player (regardless of location). The call-out can be refused as usual. If the call-out is accepted, the other Dude moves to the Town Square for the shootout. Movement costs and restrictions are ignored. The winner of the shootout gains 1 Victory Point.

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. All Gadget Weapons made by a Mad Scientist at this location have their Ghost Rock cost and Difficulty reduced by 2 until after Nightfall. Each Mad Scientist can attempt to create one Gadget per turn without booting while at Holmes' Workshop (additional Gadgets require booting as usual).

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Boot one of your Dudes. Target a Horse in play. Your Dude becomes Wanted, the Horse goes to its owner's discard pile, and you gain an amount of Ghost Rock equal to the Horse's cost.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Target a non-Strike Deed you control. Boot one of your Dudes at the Deed to become the owner of the Deed until it leaves play. If the Deed leaves play, ownership immediately returns to its original owner.

property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced. While Howard Findley is in play, your Strikes cost 1 less Ghost Rock to put into play. Findley is a Stud while in a shootout at home.

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. Strike.

property.name: Text
property.value: Blessed. Noon Miracle 6: If this Miracle succeeds, this Blessed gains a +1 Influence bonus until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shaman. Noon Spirit 8: If this Spirit succeeds, this Shaman cannot be targeted by other players' actions until after Nightfall.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Maze Rats

property.name: Text
property.value: Blessed:0. Reaction: When a Dude is Aced, boot Jacob the Healer to move the Dude home instead of Acing the Dude. The Dude is aced immediately after Nightfall.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Texas Rangers

property.name: Text
property.value: If Jeb Parker is controlled by a player who is not a Blackjacks player, his Upkeep cost is 4.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: When you are discarding a card from your Play hand without using an effect on the card, you can boot John the Doomsayer instead. Place the card face-down under him. The card cannot affect or be affected by cards in play. If John the Doomsayer is Aced or discarded, so is the card. Noon: Discard the cards in your Play hand, replacing them with the cards under John the Doomsayer. Discard John the Doomsayer.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mad Scientist:4. When Julius Bailey succeeds in creating a Gadget with a red pull, the Gadget is Aced immediately after Nightfall if in play.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Texas Rangers

property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced. All Dudes in a posse with Katie Karl are Studs while she remains in the shootout. While Katie Karl is in your posse, card effects cannot prevent you from playing Shootout actions.

property.name: Text
property.value: Huckster. Shootout Hex 5: If this Hex succeeds, target a Dude in the opposing posse. Until the end of this shootout, card effects cannot prevent the target Dude from being Aced. Any card effect that would prevent the target Dude from being aced is negated.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Law Dogs

property.name: Text
property.value: All Weapons you put into play have their Ghost Rock cost halved, rounded down. Noon: Select one of your Dudes and target a Wanted Dude at the same location. Your Dude calls out the Wanted Dude. You can use this action any number of times per turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Huckster:1. Abomination. Lucifer's Bullet rating, Influence, and Upkeep cost are equal to half the Fear level, rounded up.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Pull: Target a Harrowed Dude. If the pull is greater than the Dude's value, control of the Dude passes to the player to the left of the current controller. Control of the Dude returns to normal after Nightfall. Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mad Scientist:1. Experienced. Reaction: When Marcus Perriwinkle is Aced, you can ace a Gadget in your hand with a higher value than Marcus Perriwinkle's instead. Marcus Perriwinkle returns to your home booted.

property.name: Text
property.value: Huckster. Shootout Hex 8: If this Hex succeeds, this Huckster's Bullet rating is increased to equal the Bullet rating of one Dude in the opposing posse.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Move Mary the Wanderer to an adjacent location. This does not boot her.

property.name: Text
property.value: If the McCracken Brothers are Aced in a shootout, it is considered Acing two of your Dudes in the shootout.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Agency

property.name: Text
property.value: Lower the Fear level by 1. Ace the Unknown Hooded Figure. This Event does not resolve if another copy of it has already resolved this game. Ace this card whether it resolves or not.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon. Harrowed Power: Target an unbooted Harrowed Dude you control. Ace this card. Until the end of the game, the target has the ability 'Noon: Choose one action printed on a Dude at this location. Until after Nightfall, this Harrowed Dude can perform that action as if it were printed on this Harrowed Dude.'

property.name: Text
property.value: Public. Brothel. Casino. Dudes with less than 1 Influence cannot move to Miss Greene's Room.

property.name: Text
property.value: If Montana Holland has a ready Weapon with the word 'Rifle' in the title, she can join a posse from an adjacent location without booting and/or while booted.

property.name: Text
property.value: Non-Unique. Grifter. Noon: Show your Play hand to all of your opponents. If it does not contain any Cheatin'! cards, boot Mr. Bones to get any one Cheatin'! card from your discard pile. Show the card to your opponents, then add it to your Play hand. Discard a card from your Play hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mr. Prim's Influence is 0 while he is out of town.

property.name: Text
property.value: Public. Saloon. The New Moon Saloon counts as the Old Moon Saloon for uniqueness. Reduce the New Moon Saloon's Ghost Rock cost by 1 for each Mad Scientist in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Public. Whenever the current controller loses control of the New Town Hall or the New Town Hall leaves play, the controller loses all Town Hall Victory Points. This Deed's controller is always the player with the most Influence at it (owner wins ties), regardless of other card effects. Controller Noon: Gain 1 Town Hall Victory Point.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Target a booted Dude, who is called out by a Night Haunt and cannot refuse. No other Dudes can join this shootout. The Night Haunt is an Ace-value, 0-Bullet, 0-Influence Dude. The Night Haunt does not Draw during the shootout-instead, the Night Haunt's Draw hand rank is equal to the current Fear level minus 2. The Night Haunt leaves play after the shootout ends. Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon. Harrowed Power: Target an unbooted Harrowed Dude you control. Ace this card. Until the end of the game, this Harrowed Dude has the ability 'Noon: Target another Dude at this location. The target's Influence is reduced by 2 until after Nightfall.'

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: Play this card immediately after a player plays a Cheatin'! card. Any number of additional Cheatin'! cards can be played against that player this Draw. Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: Play when a Dude is Aced. The Dude is not aced, but is discarded instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Huckster. Reaction Hex X: Cast this Hex at the beginning of the Upkeep Phase. X is the value of a target Abomination. If this Hex succeeds, the Abomination's Upkeep cost is reduced to 0 for this turn. Noon Hex X: X is twice the value of a target Abomination. If this Hex succeeds, the Abomination's Upkeep cost is 0 while this Huckster is in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reduce Peevie's Upkeep cost by 1 for each Mad Scientist in your gang.

property.name: Text
property.value: Blessed:0. Abomination. Reaction: When hands have been revealed in a shootout Phillip Goodson is in, and his posse's hand contains exactly three different, natural 7's, the rank of that hand is increased by three ranks and is considered the worst possible hand of that rank.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Pull: Target one of your Dudes and a Goods in the same location that can be legally attached to the Dude. If the pull is greater than the value of the Goods, the Goods is attached to the Dude. Otherwise, the Dude becomes Wanted.

property.name: Text
property.value: Abomination. The Pit Wasp Swarm cannot attach Goods. A Dude cannot move into the Pit Wasp Swarm's location unless the Dude has a higher value than the Pit Wasp Swarm. The Pit Wasp Swarm can only move to an adjacent location, a Strike, or the Town Square.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Maze Rats

property.name: Text
property.value: Huckster:3. Experienced. Noon: Use when Po Yu is at a Strike you own and control. Target and Ace another player's Abomination at this location.

property.name: Text
property.value: All Dudes have their printed Influence replaced by their printed Bullet rating. This lasts until after Nightfall. Ace Judge Henry Warwick. Rachel Sumner becomes Wanted. Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. Non-Unique. Strike.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Law Dogs

property.name: Text
property.value: Cheatin'! Reaction: Play this card when another player reveals an illegal Draw hand. All of that player's Dudes become Wanted. Only one Cheatinñ! card can be played against a player per draw.

property.name: Text
property.value: All Dudes with 0 Influence are turned face-down until after Nightfall. While face-down, those Dudes are considered out of play except for uniqueness purposes. Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Target one of your Dudes with a skill rating and Influence greater than 0. That Dude's Influence is permanently decreased by 1, and his or her skill rating is permanently increased by 1. No Dude can be targeted by Ritual Scars more than once per game. Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced. Reaction: Boot Robert Holmes as one of your Goods is coming into play. You can immediately attach that Goods to another of your unbooted Dudes, regardless of that Dude's location and whether or not you control that location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mad Scientist. Gadget Difficulty: 4. Noon: If this Dude is at a Strike, boot the Rocket Boots to move this Dude to another Strike. Ace any non-Gadget Horse attached to this Dude.

property.name: Text
property.value: Public. When the Run-Down Lot enters play, you can put it on one of your opponents' streets, under your control. The Deeds adjacent to the Run-Down Lot have a -1 Production penalty. A player with the Run-Down Lot on his or her street can boot a Dude at the Run-Down Lot as a Noon action to discard the Run-Down Lot.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Maze Rats

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Pull: Boot Sally Daniels. Target a Goods at this location that can legally be attached to her. If the pull is greater than the value of the Dude with the Goods, the Goods is attached to Sally. Sally can do this even if you do not control the location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Cheatin'! Reaction: Play this card when another player reveals an illegal Draw hand. If you have a Draw hand, exchange Draw hands with that player. Cheatin'! cards cannot be played on you this draw. The cards are discarded into their owners' discard piles normally after the draw is completed. Only one Cheatinñ! card can be played against a player per draw.

property.name: Text
property.value: Weapon. This Dude is a Stud while the Sawed-Off Shotgun is ready. The Sawed-Off Shotgun decreases the Dude's Bullet rating by 1 (minimum 0).

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Pull: Ace a Deed you own. Target one Dude on that Deed before he or she goes home. If the pull is greater than or equal to the Dude's value, the Dude is aced.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: One of your Wanted Dudes becomes un-Wanted.

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. You must boot one of your Mad Scientists to bring the Secret Lab into play. Non-Mad-Scientist Dudes cannot move to the Secret Lab except by card effect. All Mad Scientists have a +1 Mad Scientist bonus while at the Secret Lab.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: Play this card immediately before Draw hands are compared in a shootout if you have an unbooted Stud in the shootout. Boot your Stud. If able, your opponent must immediately Ace a Dude in his or he posse with a Bullet rating less than your Stud's Bullet rating.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shouting Tom is worth 1 Control Point for his controller while he is in the Town Square.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Sioux Union

property.name: Text
property.value: Shaman:1. Experienced. Harrowed Dudes in the same location as Singing Feather cannot perform Noon or Shootout actions on their cards.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Agency

property.name: Text
property.value: Blessed:2. Experienced. All Terrors in a shootout opposing Sister Mary have the ability 'Shootout: Boot this Dude to go home.' Shootout: Target a Terror in the opposing posse whose value is lower than 10 minus the current Fear level. Ace the Terror.

property.name: Text
property.value: Skunky Swade will not move to a location you do not own. His Influence does not add to your total during Nightfall. Noon: Send a Dude home booted from this location if this location is a Strike you own. Shootout: Target an opposing Dude in this shootout. If the shootout is at a Strike you own, the target is sent home booted.

property.name: Text
property.value: If any Terrors are in play, the player (or players) with the most Terrors in play has his or her lowest value Dude (or Dudes) Aced, and you must ace this card. If no Terrors are in play, this card is discarded without effect.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mad Scientist. Gadget Difficulty: 4. Noon: Ace the Slumber Needle. Boot a Dude at this location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced. Harrowed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shaman. Shootout Spirit X: Target a Dude in the opposing posse. X is the value of the Dude. If this Spirit succeeds, send the Dude home booted.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Harrowed Power: Target one of your unbooted Harrowed Dudes. Until the end of the game, the Dude has the ability 'Reaction: When a Harrowed pull is sending this Dude home from a shootout, this Dude is sent home without booting.' Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Abomination. The Stone Man will not attach Goods.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Sioux Union

property.name: Text
property.value: Strikes a Hawk is a Stud when she has a Bow and Arrow ready.

property.name: Text
property.value: If one of your Dudes was Aced by another player during a shootout last turn, any one of your Dudes can immediately move to the Town Square and call out any target Dude controlled by the player who aced your Dude. The target Dude must move to the Town Square and accept the shootout. Movement restrictions are ignored.

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. Non-Sweetrock Dudes have their Influence reduced by 1 (minimum 0) while in the Sweetrock Smoking Lounge.

property.name: Text
property.value: After revealing your starting posse, you can pay for and put into play one non-Control Point Strike. Other players' Dudes can only move to that Strike using a card effect. All of your Dudes gain a +1 Bullet bonus while at a Strike you own.

property.name: Text
property.value: Huckster. Noon Hex X: Target an opponent's Dude at this location. This Huckster calls out the Dude, who cannot refuse. No other Dudes can join. If the Dude is Aced in the shootout, make the Hex pull. X is the value plus twice the Influence of the Dude. If successful, gain Victory Points equal to the Dude's Influence and remove the Dude from play - no other copy can enter play this game. Ace this Hex.

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. Controller Reaction: Gain 1 Ghost Rock when a Horse comes into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Target one of your Dudes in this shootout. That Dude cannot be targeted by other players' actions until the shootout is over. Until the end of the shootout, the target Dude cannot be Aced unless your hand is beaten by at least one rank.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Law Dogs

property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced. Noon: T.C. can call out any one Maze Rat in this or an adjacent location. Shootout: T.C. gains a +2 Bullet bonus until the end of the shootout if none.

property.name: Text
property.value: Pull: Any Strikes with a value equal to the pull are either discarded or Aced (owner's choice). The owners of aced Strikes gain an amount of Ghost Rock equal to twice the printed Production of each of their aced Strikes.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mad Scientist. Gadget Difficulty: 5. Shootout: Boot the Telescopic Pistol Sight. When your next Draw hand is revealed, the suit of all of the cards in the hand is changed to Clubs. This makes your next Draw hand an illegal hand regardless or the cards therein.

property.name: Text
property.value: Abomination. The Terrormental will not attach Goods. The Terrormental cannot be targeted with Spell actions.

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. Non-Unique. When The Back Room enters play, place it behind an in-town Deed you own. The Back Room is adjacent only to the Deed to which it is attached unless adjacency is granted by a card effect. Dudes can only move into The Back Room from an adjacent location.

property.name: Text
property.value: All of your Collegium Dudes gain a +1 Influence bonus while they have at least 1 Gadget Weapon attached and ready. You gain 1 Victory Point every time you Ace an opposing Stud in a shootout if one of your Dudes in the posse has a Gadget Weapon ready.

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. Strike.

property.name: Text
property.value: Public. Strike. In Town. When The Lode enters play, put a token on it. Before each High Noon, add a token. The Lode's Control Points and Production are equal to its number of tokens. The Lode's controller collects its Production even if not the owner. This Deed's controller is always the player with the most Influence at it (owner wins ties), regardless of other card effects.

property.name: Text
property.value: Raise the Fear level by 2. The Sweetrock Dude (or Dudes) in play with the highest Influence goes insane and is discarded. This Event does not resolve if another copy of it has already resolved this game. Ace this card whether it resolves or not.

property.name: Text
property.value: Public. Saloon. Billiard Hall. Controller Noon: Pay an amount of Ghost Rock equal to The Side Pocket Billiard Hall's cost. You are now considered the owner of The Side Pocket Billiard Hall until the end of the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shaman. Reaction Spirit 10: When another player plays an Action card, boot this Shaman. Pull from that player's deck for this Spirit. If this Spirit succeeds, the Action is canceled without effect.

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. Strike.

card.name: The T and Q Cattle Ranch

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. Out of Town.

property.name: Text
property.value: Public. All Hucksters the controller is bringing into play have their Ghost Rock cost decreased by 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Target one of your Dudes. Until after Nightfall, that Dude is considered to have 1 greater Influence for the purposes of controlling the Deed he or she was in when you played this card. This does not affect your total combined Influence.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Target one of your Dudes. Until after Nightfall, that Dude's Influence is always equal to his or her Bullet rating. That Dude cannot refuse a call-out until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mad Scientist. Gadget Difficulty: 6. Reaction Pull: Boot the Time Vision Goggles when another player reveals an Event. If the pull is red, the Event resolves as if you had put it into play instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout Pull: Target one of your Dudes in this shootout. If the pull is red, your Dude gains a +2 Bullet bonus and becomes a Stud until the end of the shootout. If the pull is black, your Dude has a -2 Bullet penalty (minimum 0) until the end of the shootout.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Target one of your Dudes in this shootout. That Dude can have two Weapons ready for the duration of this shootout. Choose one unready Weapon, which becomes ready if it can legally be made ready. At the end of the shootout, choose one ready Weapon to keep ready; the other Weapon becomes unready.

property.name: Text
property.value: Ace one of your Strikes. Target another one of your Strikes. The target Strike has it's printed Production permanently doubled. Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced. Harrowed. You must have another Whateley Dude in play to bring the Unknown Hooded Figure into play. Other Whateley Dudes in the Unknown Hooded Figure's location cannot be called out while the Unknown Hooded Figure is unbooted.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon. Harrowed Power: Target an unbooted Harrowed Dude you control. Ace this card. Until the end of the game, this Dude has the ability 'Reaction: Immediately after a Dude in this Dude's location fails a skill pull, the skilled Dude can pull again. If the second pull is successful, the first pull is ignored and the skill pull is successful.'

property.name: Text
property.value: Shaman. Noon Spirit 5: Boot this Shaman. If this Spirit succeeds, you can discard any or all of the cards in your Play hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Move this Dude to an adjacent location.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Walter enters play, target a Dude with Influence less than Walter's. Walter enters play at the location of the targeted Dude. The Dude is sent home and is unbooted.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Warwick's Gavel has no Ghost Rock cost when being attached to Henry Warwick. Noon: Target a Wanted Dude. That Dude becomes un-Wanted. Noon: Target a Dude under the effects of the Jail. That Dude is returned to play and sent home booted.

property.name: Text
property.value: Blessed. Noon Miracle 7: If this Miracle succeeds, all Dudes at this location are booted. If this location is a Saloon or Brothel, its Production is raised by 2 for the next Upkeep Phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Abomination. Non-Unique. The Wave Shadow cannot attach Goods. There is no limit to the number of Wave Shadows that each player can have in play. Wave Shadows cannot be targeted by other players' Action cards. Card memory does not apply to Wave Shadows.

property.name: Text
property.value: For each Weapon in play (ready or unready), its owner must pay 1 Ghost Rock or discard it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. Saloon. Controller Noon: One of your Dudes (your choice) at Whiskey Nick's Joint gains a +1 Bullet bonus and is a Stud until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Huckster:0. Abomination. Reaction: When hands have been revealed in a shootout William Badson is in, and his posse's hand contains exactly three different, natural 6s, the rank of that hand is increased by three ranks and is considered the worst possible hand of that rank.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Law Dogs

property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced. Reaction: When a Dude refuses a call-out from Xiong 'Wendy' Cheng, the Dude permanently has a -1 Influence and -1 Bullet penalty (minimum 0).

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: Play this card after one of your Dudes accepts a call-out from a Dude with a lower Bullet rating. No other Dudes can join the shootout. No Reactions other than Cheatin'! cards can be played during this shootout.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: Play this card when one of your Dudes has moved to a new location. Target and move one of your unbooted Dudes to the same location. Costs to move, such as booting, must be paid as usual.
